title: IS_ENTITY_POSITION_FROZEN
content:
0xEDBE6ADD// IsEntityPositionFrozen
bool IS_ENTITY_POSITION_FROZEN(Entity entity);Parameters:entity: The entity to check forReturns: Boolean stating if it is frozen or not.A getter for FREEZE_ENTITY_POSITION.Examples:LuaJavaScriptlocal isFrozen = IsEntityPositionFrozen(PlayerPedId())
